RelatedSentence: It will be alleged the Bunbury man was at the Miami Plaza Shopping Centre on April 19 where he indecently assaulted a young girl under the age of 13 .
The arrest comes one week after police issued a series of photographs in the hope of identifying a man they believed could help with the investigation .
